title: 3 and Out - Packers/Bills + Week 8 NFL Reaction
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Packers/Bills + Week 8 NFL Reaction
description:
John reacts to Week 8 NFL action, including why things are only going to get worse for the Packers, and if the Bills can finally win the AFC with home field advantage in the playoffs, why Josh McDaniels is a disaster with the Raiders, why the Seahawks are thriving without Russell Wilson, and why the A.J. Brown trade has been huge for the Eagles.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #Volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
